description: This form appends the following region into the permitted CMIP7 Controlled Vocabularies list.\n\nThe permitted set of values are defined in the WCRP universal constants repo. Regions are not yet in the universal repo - this is a CMIP7-specific CV.

label: Issue Type
description: Select whether adding new or modifying existing

label: Region
description: Select the regions to add to CMIP7
